<headline>
"Massacre" at Charlie Hebdo Office - Paris - False Flag event
</headline>
<post id="p1" author="frenchie" datetime="2015-02-05T00:42:00">
The fantastic story of Paris killings is still going on.
French newspaper "Le Canard Enchaîné", in his new today edition, is about to unravel a troubling detail.

Amar R., an accomplice of Coulibaly, seen in his company a few hours before the Hyper Casher killing spree (?) was the fiancé of a gendarmery NCO, specialized in the Islamist intelligence. Clever Guy!
It's so huge that without doubt, in a few hours, all details will be available in English.
This Amar R. was seen going in and out freely from the Rosny-sous-Bois premises.
Sources in french
http://tempsreel.nouvelobs.com/charlie-hebdo/20150204.OBS1627/la-romance-suspecte-d-un-complice-de-coulibaly-avec-une-gendarme.html
http://www.lepoint.fr/societe/un-proche-de-coulibaly-en-couple-avec-une-sous-officier-de-la-gendarmerie-03-02-2015-1902066_23.php
http://www.ladepeche.fr/article/2015/02/04/2043338-un-complice-d-amedy-coulibaly-en-couple-avec-une-gendarmette.html

http://www.lefigaro.fr/actualite-france/2015/02/04/01016-20150204ARTFIG00132-l-incroyable-liaison-amoureuse-d-une-gendarmette-et-d-un-complice-de-coulibaly.php

<post id="p3" author="Qwerty" datetime="2015-02-05T03:00:00">
Though I can not prove it now, there are rumors the Charlie Hebdo area / boulevard Richard Lenoir was cordoned off on the 7th of January, officially for the filming of a movie.
I think the (non)event was hidden in plain sight, using the movie filming event as a smoke screen.
If (and only if) I am right, that would explain many things like:

- the bozos’ car turning left (wrong way!) on Blvd Richard Lenoir after shooting at the police car, and still be in the right way on the other side of the same boulevard. Absolutely not logical if they are really fleeing the Charlie Hebdo massacre scene, but totally feasible if these are two different scenes of the making of a movie. They don’t even need to be filmed in the right order.
- the polish videographer expecting blank bullets,
- no blood at the dead policeman scene, dead policeman seemingly changing feet position, blood added to the scene afterwards,
- the ‘bozo in chief’ seemingly shooting a blank (too much smoke) at the policeman head.
- silence in Paris streets except for gun shots and hooded bozos shouting and pointing the wrong (left) finger toward the sky.
- no cars in the streets, no cars on Boulevard Richard Lenoir, except at the very end of the the Panamza (Willow?) video,
- all these people with white things (clipboards?) in their hands in the Panamza (Willow?) video and other videos,
- Jordi Mir particular way of filming the bozos’ car when it leaves the murder scene,

- the incredible ability of Jordi Mir to choose to film a car ‘at random’, that car happens to stop in front of his window. He will be able to film the only ‘murder’ on film of the whole Charlie Hebdo event.
- the mark on the street pavement when the bozos returned to their car after the head shot. Did a dog pee on the front wheel while they were running like headless chicken?

- the particular behavior of the swat team during the assault. Shooting in the back of team mates, device exploding IN FRONT of the Hyper Casher and in the middle of the swat team, swat team hiding from a killer with an AK47 behind shop front glass door and (blue) glass windows!
- The particular behavior of the RAID when climbing this small hill before the assault,
http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2ef3vm_des-policiers-glissent-sur-l-herbe-a-la-porte-de-vincennes_news

The RAID is not the average swat team. They are supposed to be the best of the best, black belt in martial arts, athletes at the top of their physical capacity. 200 members all together. These guys acting (!) like high school girls during a field trip can not be the RAID elite unit. To me, they are actors at best.
- The surviving members of the Charlie Hebdo team laughing during the “Je suis Charlie” march.
- etc
Thanks to 9/11, Boston bombings and Sandy Hook, we already know they use crisis actors. Why not in Paris too?
I expect nobody died, except maybe the patsies, if they even existed.
</post>
<post id="p4" author="NT1" datetime="2015-02-05T03:01:00">
PoliPsy: Post #1077
In response to your final simple question, I used the graphic I reproduced and linked in my post #1074.
This picture, taken outside the Hebdo office after the gunmen had left, shows two bicycle officers in uniform.
[attachment=762]

You say Merabet was a bicycle policeman but the Paris Match picture does not support that view. If Merabet was a bicycle polceman and was shot in Boulevard Richard Lenoir, where is his helmet and his bicycle – and why does he not have the twin reflective bands on each leg that all the best-dressed bicycle police wear?
</post>
<post id="p5" author="PoliPsy" datetime="2015-02-05T04:52:00">
<quote orig_author="NT1">

If Merabet was a bicycle polceman and was shot in Boulevard Richard Lenoir, where is his helmet and his bicycle – and why does he not have the twin reflective bands on each leg that all the best-dressed bicycle police wear?
</quote>
@NT1,
Here's an even more simple question without so many assumptions. Why did you state that Merabet was driving the police car? Where is the article or other documentation stating that?
<quote orig_author="NT1">
That's Merabet's car after he reversed at speed out of Allee Vert and crashed into the parked car.
</quote>
</post>
<post id="p6" author="frenchie" datetime="2015-02-05T05:30:00">
Thank you all for your precise analysis of the events.
In the meantime, I try to collect facts, related, or not, with Paris attacks.
- This morning, I related here the romantic link between Coulibaly accomplice and a specialist of terrorism intelligence. First scandal.

- This afternoon, I relate the arrest of the N°1 of Paris Police (the equivalent of the FBI big boss), Bernard Petit, with three other high rank police officers. The invoked reason, giving inside information to the former GIGN (Elite Gendarmerie corps) founder and boss Christian Prouteau, suspected in a past political scandal linked to terrorism.
Minister of the Interior (“Ministre de l'Intérieur”) Bernard Cazeneuve gave a Press Conference in the yard of Palais de l'Elysee, he looks livid, enraged.
Links in english
http://www.english.rfi.fr/culture/20150204-paris-police-chief-among-four-custody-over-alleged-conman-case-leaks
http://www.thenewstribune.com/2015/02/04/3622314/high-level-police-arrested-in.html
</post>
<post id="p7" author="NT1" datetime="2015-02-05T06:35:00">
PoliPsy: Post #1088
Please refer to the graphic (not mine) shown in my post #1074, from which I have extracted the following information.
Box 4: They get back into their car and drive up Allée Vert but are blocked by a police car. They get out and spray the car with bullets, wounding the policeman inside.
Box 5: The police car reverses at speed and crashes into a parked car at the junction of Boulevard Richard Lenoir.
Box 6: The wounded officer staggers from the car across a tree-lined central reservation and collapses. He raises his right hand as the gunmen approach but is shot in the head.

There is a white, wavy dotted line drawn across the central reservation linking Box 5 to Box 6, showing the presumed route the wounded policeman took, and big red arrows linking the Box 4 action to that shown in Box 5. We all seem to agree that Merabet was the policeman shown in Box 6 and the only conclusion to be drawn from the graphic is that he is the main subject of Box 6, Box 5 and Box 4. Therefore, Merabet was the policeman who reversed his car at speed down Allee Verte. There was no one else, other than an unknown person who seems to have been in the back of the car.
I’m not sure I can make it any simpler than that.
</post>

Yes, we can tie all sorts of imaginations and rumors into a cohesive possibility. Here's another rumor traveling the grapevine, because I have just started it.

Obama, Michael, Reggie Love, Kerry Cassidy and Andrew Basiago were all stuck on Mars causing Obama to be unable to be where he 'needed' to be in Paris. It seems that there was a glitch in the Mars to Earth jump room power generator.

Engineers were unable to energize the jump room transporter mechanism because of a problem with the dilithium crystal reserve. The cause is still unknown although it is believed to be associated with the fact that the star gate was also down for similar reasons.

Engineers suspect that quasar-class power surges caused gravity-wave induced space-time fluctuations which in turn burned out the interplanetary circuits associated with the jump room transport system. This short quickly drained the dilithium crystal reserve, so once the circuits had been reestablished, there was no power source available to energize them.

Is it mere coincidence that all this happened at the same exact time that a planet-sized craft was extracting solar mass from our Sun -- unsupervised and without a permit? Most people and a vast majority of scientists think not.

Even though Obama could not personally act in the Charlie Hebdo movie during the parade of the heads of state, he was able to send a hyper space message (capable of penetrating the plasma of the Van Allen belts surrounding Earth) to director Stanley Kubrick (who is still alive and making hoax movies for the government) to proceed with the production of the Charlie Hebdo movie.

Kubrick dispatched assistants James Cameron and Leonardo Dicaprio (incognito) to the Rues and Boulevards of Paris to place directorial markers to guide the crisis actors in their movements. They also pasted bullet hole decals on car windshields and store front display windows.

Cameron was especially concerned about loading the magazines for weapons because the script called for a mix of blanks and live rounds. Cameron was in the group that argued no live rounds were required because bullet hole decals were being used. Cameron knew that if he screwed up he could have another Brandon Lee episode on his hands with real dead bodies all over Paris. But Cameron's protests fell on deaf ears. Stanley's mind was made up, and another Kubrick was in the making.
Then Stanley pulled yet another Kubrick when he prematurely yelled, 'Action!' before everyone was ready.

Luz was not yet on the set. Luz was still involved in a politically correct and culturally acceptable homosexual and pedaphilic tryst with François Hollande, Pope Francis and a clone of Shirley Temple at age six. Yes, we know the prophet would have been extremely jealous and aroused.

Renald (Luz) found this extremely funny and could not shake the vision of this unholy trinity+1 when he later witnessed editor Patrick Pelloux getting it on with Hollande in a public receiving line for the bereavement photo-op scene. Pelloux was heard later to say, "It was not the bird crap on François that caused people to laugh and lose the authenticity of sadness for the 'loss' of our friends and co-workers. The reason for the failure of this scene is that François had not been satisfied by the Pope, Luz and the clone, so he was just getting a little extra from me in the receiving line. The man is insatiable."
Amidst all of the chaos of these technical glitches and directorial cock-ups, the prop master failed to correctly attach the 'blood bag' to the crisis actor portraying cycle cop, Merabet.

"What the hell?," complained the crisis actor. "How in the name of Mohammed is this to be convincing if my head does not explode and the sidewalk is not flooded with ketchup?! Give me two smoke bombs to distract from there not being any blood!"
But it was too late. Kubrick had shouted, "Action!" The ruse was in motion.

The iPhone cinematographers did not have time to free up the memory in their phones. They took their stations but were unable to film the full scenes for a lack of memory which cut some of the footage inexplicably short. Thanks, Stanley.

The four teams of crisis actors portraying the terrorist shooters where still adjusting their panties and bras when they heard 'Action!.' Rushing to the set without being fully dressed caused the little one to walk as though her legs were tied together because she had a severe and painful panty wedgie.

But the show went on. Global news began covering the filming of the movie while Paris had been totally evacuated to eliminate anyone being able to declare it was a contrived media hoax directed by Kubrick.
Prove or disprove?
P.S. Apologies to the threads regarding the Apollo mission and Van Allen belts. I'm finding your discussions interesting.
</post>

<post id="p13" author="NT1" datetime="2015-02-05T11:56:00">
PoliPsy: Post #1092

I like your sentence, “Objective observers are not interested in imagined scenarios without evidence.” That is the whole purpose of this thread, to test the evidence fed to us to see if it withstands scrutiny. So far it seems to have failed the test.

So, for example, there is Jordi Mir, said to be all alone in his flat, filming something he could not comprehend. Is that true? Where is the evidence? We know that there were at least two other people in the room with him, possibly more – the audio confirms it. That being so, we cannot prove that JM was holding the camera or was even there at all.

Were there shots fired on Boulevard Richard Lenoir? You have heard bangs on a video soundtrack and have been totally convinced they are genuine, based on nothing more than they sounded like shots. I took the trouble to look at the audio and came to the conclusion they were fake, for reasons I gave.

You believe Merabet was a bicycle policeman because you read it in a newspaper article; did you test the evidence? He is not wearing the uniform of a bicycle policeman in the JM video, yet you do not question the anomaly. The Paris Match photograph shows him leaning on a patrol car, that also suggest he wasn’t a bicycle policeman.
The face in the Paris Match photograph looks nothing like the face on the person in the Jordi Mir video; why is that?

There are many other anomalies that have been highlighted elsewhere and others that will appear if we keep digging and question everything. Is the purpose of this forum to find the cracks in the official narrative, or is it to confirm it? If it is the latter, we are all wasting our time.
</post>
<post id="p14" author="particular" datetime="2015-02-05T12:52:00">
<quote orig_author="PoliPsy">
Where did you read in articles or documentation that Merabet was driving the patrol car? Provide the links to the articles or other documentation proving your first claim.
</quote>
Very very very important thing!
There are many "facts" presented in media and Internet. They can be true or not. In any case it is important to keep track of any information to be able to check the sources.
Consider Colombo investigating the CH attack.
I guess that he should notice the following:
10 minutes in CH office(why?)
list of names (why?)(who has written it?)
the Polish cameramen were not afraid of shots, joking about blank shots, ...(why?)
the roof movie showing their position was edited (France 24) to hide them a little (by whom? why?)
was the Polish movie taken on demand?( whose? )
(ii)
information about Merabet (where he appeared?) contain a contradiction (why?)
why the gunmen started the Jordi Mir's action?
is it possible for a AK47 shot not to spoil the sidewalk?
is it possible that several shots produced no blood?
why the blood was put there?(by whom?)
was Merabet killed by AK47 or some revolver shot?
is Merabet dead?
(iii)
why Jordi Mir started the movie?(on demand?)
why he edited it (at least the end)?
the sound analysis of the shots of the movie?(are the sounds genuine?)
why he posted it to FB without consulting police?
why he stopped filming the whole event?
are there some other takes of the scene?
corresponds the movie to other eyewitnesses in the park(plenty of them)?
(iv)
the C3 car switch without a real damage leaving ID and DNA trace(why?)
polite acting(why?)
only 2 CCTV images from the oil station (why?)
messy online phone call with Cherif Kouachi (sound analysis of his voice?)
killing both Kouachi's(?) without prooving they are guilty
how tall is Cherif Kouachi?
(vi)
Ahmed's action, self movie, hostages, dead shots?
(vii)
where is Ahmed's girl?
was she involved in some stage of planning?
were the gunmen both boys?
(viii)
the death of Helric Fredou?
could he collect the police evidences (movies, photos)?
what important has he noticed?

Summing up there are too many questions. Only several of them could be answered on a forensic level ... <img src="images/smilies/undecided.gif" style="vertical-align: middle;" border="0" alt="Undecided" title="Undecided">
Good luck boys & girls <img src="images/smilies/blush.gif" style="vertical-align: middle;" border="0" alt="Blush" title="Blush">
</post>
<post id="p15" author="PoliPsy " datetime="2015-02-05T14:37:00">
<quote orig_author="NT1">
PoliPsy: Post #1092

I like your sentence, “Objective observers are not interested in imagined scenarios without evidence.” That is the whole purpose of this thread, to test the evidence fed to us to see if it withstands scrutiny. So far it seems to have failed the test.

So, for example, there is Jordi Mir, said to be all alone in his flat, filming something he could not comprehend. Is that true? Where is the evidence? We know that there were at least two other people in the room with him, possibly more – the audio confirms it. That being so, we cannot prove that JM was holding the camera or was even there at all.

Were there shots fired on Boulevard Richard Lenoir? You have heard bangs on a video soundtrack and have been totally convinced they are genuine, based on nothing more than they sounded like shots. I took the trouble to look at the audio and came to the conclusion they were fake, for reasons I gave.

You believe Merabet was a bicycle policeman because you read it in a newspaper article; did you test the evidence? He is not wearing the uniform of a bicycle policeman in the JM video, yet you do not question the anomaly. The Paris Match photograph shows him leaning on a patrol car, that also suggest he wasn’t a bicycle policeman.
The face in the Paris Match photograph looks nothing like the face on the person in the Jordi Mir video; why is that?

There are many other anomalies that have been highlighted elsewhere and others that will appear if we keep digging and question everything. Is the purpose of this forum to find the cracks in the official narrative, or is it to confirm it? If it is the latter, we are all wasting our time.
</quote>

Yes. Question everything including alternative speculations and imaginations. Where did you read that Merabet was the driver of the patrol car that crashed at Blvd Richard Lenoir and Allee Verte? You stated it as a fact. Show your references and proofs. Then and only then can we attempt to weigh the published version of the account against your speculations.
So far, you have pushed the ideas of:
- Directorial markers for multiple takes in a hoaxed movie of the Merabet incident,
- No shot was fired and Merabet acted dead,
- The actor playing Merabet was wearing a mask which became distorted as he twisted his body on the sidewalk,
- Bullet decals were used and no real bullet holes existed in car windshields or shop display windows,
- Merabet failed to rupture his fake-blood bag,
- Merabet succeeded in firing his smoke bomb to simulate a bullet impact with the sidewalk,
- The actors portraying the shooters missed several of their directorial markers,
- All of the independent videos of the incident are actually hoax videos and all the videographers are accomplices to the hoax,
- None of the videographers could possibly have had any indication that anything was going on outside their windows before they started filming ...
These are just a few of the speculations you have made with less evidence than what is available in the open market of published accounts.
In the process, these are some of the claims that have had to be overcome by showing examples and evidence:

- The claim that Merabet was shot in the head; a claim made by the mainstream media and adopted by the alternative community while visible evidence exists to establish that Merabet was shot in the upper back or lower neck and that the bullet exited his upper chest or lower neck and impacted the sidewalk,
- The claim that every shot to the head by an AK-47 causes the head to explode like a watermelon - they do not in many cases,
- The claim that every shot from an AK-47 produces a muzzle flair that can be captured on 29-frame per second video; time and time again we see an absence of the muzzle flair,
- The claim that every shot from an AK-47 produces an obvious upward recoil when the shooter is running forward and leaning forward and already following his target in a downward motion,
- That the C3 car was moved between the beginning of the Mir video and the end of the Mir video - it did not move,
- The claim that the Mir video had multiple edits. Show the frames where these cuts were made. No one has shown these edit points,

- That Jordi Mir and the other videographers had no way of knowing anything was going on in the street worth recording before they started filming the shooters outside their windows. They had ample notification that gunshots and car crashes were occurring within a couple hundred feet of their locations,
- That the smoke bomb idea is fabricated and reinforced with altered video deception by digitally smearing the sidewalk impact to the officer's left hand.

All you need to do to bring credibility to most of the speculations you have promoted is simply to prove that Merabet did not die and that he was not in his casket and that he is not buried in the cemetery. Prove that and your proof for a hoax in general is made.

Do I buy all of the 'facts' presented in the media (MSM and alternative)? No. Am I skeptical of everything? Yes? Do I believe it could be a false flag? Yes. Do I believe the event is being exploited by everyone for their own benefit? Yes.
Acknowledged problem issues:
- An apparent lack of blood. (blood pooled in clothing and body armor?)
- An apparent lack of mussle/chamber smoke (poor quality video? low smoke ammo? slight wind blowing left to right? running motion?)
- Scant information on Merabet's movements and locations during the incident.
- Where is his weapon?
- Where is his bike?
- Where is the autopsy report?
- Where is the death certificate?
- There's more ...

But at the moment, I see little reason to doubt that Merabet was shot as Mir recorded it. So as often as you and others promote the idea that the Merabet shooting was a hoax, I will have to respond to the contrary as long as I have the luxury of free time to do so. This may soon change, then your speculations will become unchallenged unless someone else picks up the torch of loyal opposition.
Now please excuse me while I head to the jump room for a fashionably late dinner on Mars.
</post>
</doc>
